full_text:
In the Court of the Additional Chief Judicial Magistrate,
Thiruvananthapuram
Present: Elsa Catherine George
Additional Chief Judicial Magistrate.
Dated the 3" day of March 2025
CC: 52/2025
Complainant : State represented by the Sub Inspector of Police, Medical
College Police Station in Crime No. 1551/2024
(By APP)
Accused : Seyyadhali, Chinnan Vila Colony, Punnakulam, Kottukal
Village.
Offence : u/s 118(a) of Kerala Police Act.
Plea : Guilty
Finding : Guilty
Sentence/order : Accused is sentenced to pay a fine of %750/- for the
offence u/s.118(a) of Kerala Police Act and in default; to
undergo simple imprisonment for 7 days.
This case having been heard today, the court passed the following:-
JUDGMENT
1. Accused stands charged with the offence punishable u/s.118(a) of Kerala Police Act.
2. Accused is present. Requirement u/s.207 Cr.PC was complied with and after hearing
both sides, charge was framed for the offence aforesaid, read over and explained to

the accused to which he pleaded guilty . I accept the plea since I am convinced of
its genuineness and that the same is made voluntarily. Hence, I find the accused
guilty of the offence punishable u/s.118(a) of Kerala Police Act and convicted him
u/s. 271(2) of BNSS. Heard on the question of sentence to which the accused
pleaded for leniency. Accordingly, the accused is sentenced to pay a fine of %750/-
for the offence u/s.118(a) of Kerala Police Act and in default; to undergo simple
imprisonment for 7 days.
Dated this the 3" day of March 2025.
Â¢
Elsa Catherine George,
Additional Chief Judicial Magistrate,
Thiruvananthapuram.
BECHER NY
for OW.
Sf OSE
Ciena J
